channel.title: Javac: The file cannot be found: *.java
channel.description:
Everytime I compile my client I get this!:
The system cannot find the path specified. javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
--- Can someone please help me!?!?!?

Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Can someone please help me!?!?!?[/quote]

Its all in your code easy to fix …
